question:
Consider the following information in context with RTI Act :
  1. RTI Act is applicable to all states of India including Jammu & Kashmir
  2. All NGOâ€™s come under the purview of the RTI Act 2005.
Which among the above statements is / are correct ?
explanation: The Right to Information Act, 2005 came into force all over India on October 12th 2005 (120th day of enactment on 15th June 2005), the RTI act extends to the whole of India (except the state of Jammu and Kashmir), all bodies which come under government notification come under RTI. Only those NGOs, which are owned, controlled or are substantially financed by the government come under RTI.
